titles.title: Prioritizing Evidence for Workforce Development Act
Prioritizing Evidence for Workforce Development Act
A bill to amend the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act to prioritize programs that provide evidence of performance.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Prioritizing Evidence for Workforce Development Act
This bill requires state workforce development plans to describe how the state will prioritize funding evidence-based programs that demonstrate positive outcomes for their target populations.
